Title: Provides that certain revenue generated from video lottery terminals at the Aqueduct racetrack be used solely for the maintenance and upgrading of the Aqueduct racetrack
Summary: Provides that certain revenue generated from video lottery terminals at the Aqueduct racetrack be used solely for the maintenance and upgrading of the Aqueduct racetrack.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the disposition of certain revenue from the video lottery gaming facility at Aqueduct racetrack
